title: Monthly Deportation and Removal Numbers (May 2025 – Aug 2025)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, 5 U.S.C. § 552, I hereby request records sufficient to show the total number of deportations, removals, and returns carried out by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement between May 1, 2025 and August 15, 2025.

Specifically, I request that the records include the following breakdowns, if available:
1. Monthly totals for each month in the requested period.
2. Geographic distribution of removals (by state, ICE field office, or region).
3. Removal categories, including but not limited to: criminal removals, non-criminal removals, expedited removals, reinstated removals, voluntary returns, and any other internal classification used by ICE.

I request that responsive records be provided in electronic format (Excel, CSV, or PDF preferred).
I respectfully request a waiver of all fees associated with this request. The disclosure of the requested information is in the public interest as it will contribute significantly to public understanding of government operations and immigration enforcement trends. The information is not sought for commercial purposes.
Thank you in advance for your assistance. Please do not hesitate to contact me via email if clarification is needed.

Sincerely,  
Riley M

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Riley M
